recipesJson.name: Moo Milk: Moo E-liquids Vanilla Almond Milk [#REMIXMONTH]
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A Remix for Moo Eliquids: Vanilla Almond Milk
Development Notes -> https://diyordievaping.com/2017/06/05/moo-eliquids-vanilla-almond-milk-remix-remixmonth/

reviews.text: Dint have original but didnt like this one
Good clone. Vaguely remember trying the original a while ago. Smells and taste pretty close. Light almond flavor, heavy on the vanilla and cream
